Job Title: SFMC/QA Consultant

Location: Dallas, TX (Onsite)

Duration: Long Term Contract

Note: The client is seeking local too available to work onsite.

Required Skills:

Mandatory: Salesforce Marketing Cloud Email Specialist Certification.
10 years of QA experience with strong expertise in API/Web Services testing and SFMC automation.
Proficiency in automation frameworks (MUnit, Rest Assured, SOAPUI, Postman).
Strong hands-on experience with SOAP, REST, JSON, XML, XSD, XPath.
Good exposure to DevOps tools (CI/CD, Git, Bitbucket, Maven, Jenkins).
Strong working knowledge of MuleSoft Any Point Platform.
Experience testing SFMC modules (Automation Studio, Email Studio, Contact Builder, Journey Builder, APIs).
Familiarity with AMP Script (nice to have).
Strong SQL skills for data validation.
Experience in Agile and Waterfall methodologies.
Excellent problem-solving, communication, and collaboration skills.


We represent Logisoft Technologies, Inc. with pride; We present ourselves as a premiere Technology, Consulting, Product Development, and Software Services Company.

Our Head Office is located in South Plainfield, NJ, and Our Offices location is in Hyderabad, INDIA & Accra, GHANA.

We are Microsoft Official Partners - A Microsoft Certified Partner that helps customers with a range of IT projects and specific IT solutions.

We started our journey in the year 2008. In the past 17+ years, we have acquired the trust of many IT market leaders.

LOGISOFT Technologies is committed to a policy of Equal Employment Opportunity and will not discriminate against an applicant or employee on the basis of age, sex, sexual orientation, race, color, creed, national origin, ancestry, disability, marital status, or any other legally protected basis under federal, state or local law.

optimized_text:
## **Job Title:** Salesforce Marketing Cloud QA Tester (SFMC/QA Consultant)

### About the Role
Logisoft Technologies Inc. is seeking a seasoned **Salesforce Marketing Cloud QA Tester** for a **12‑month W2 contract** based **onsite in Dallas, TX**. This long‑term contract role is ideal for candidates with deep QA expertise in API/Web Services testing, SFMC automation, and DevOps practices. The position is open to **corp‑to‑corp** arrangements and will report to the **QA Lead** within the Digital Marketing Services team.

---

## Responsibilities
- Design, develop, and execute **manual and automated test cases** for SFMC modules (Automation Studio, Email Studio, Contact Builder, Journey Builder, and APIs).
- Create and maintain **API test suites** using **MUnit, Rest‑Assured, SOAPUI, and Postman**.
- Validate data integrity with **SQL queries** and ensure correct handling of **JSON, XML, XSD, and XPath**.
- Integrate test automation into **CI/CD pipelines** using **Git, Bitbucket, Maven, Jenkins**, and other DevOps tools.
- Collaborate with developers, product owners, and business analysts in **Agile (Scrum/Kanban) and Waterfall** environments to identify defects early.
- Document test results, defects, and provide clear **root‑cause analysis**.
- Participate in **code reviews**, **peer testing**, and **knowledge‑sharing sessions**.
- Ensure compliance with **Salesforce Marketing Cloud Email Specialist** best practices.

---

## Required Skills & Qualifications
- **Mandatory:** Salesforce Marketing Cloud **Email Specialist Certification**.
- **10+ years** of QA experience with a strong focus on **API/Web Services testing** and **SFMC automation**.
- Proficiency with automation frameworks: **MUnit, Rest‑Assured, SOAPUI, Postman**.
- Hands‑on experience with **SOAP, REST, JSON, XML, XSD, XPath**.
- Solid understanding of **DevOps tools**: CI/CD, **Git, Bitbucket, Maven, Jenkins**.
- Strong working knowledge of **MuleSoft Anypoint Platform**.
- Experience testing SFMC modules: **Automation Studio, Email Studio, Contact Builder, Journey Builder, APIs**.
- **SQL** proficiency for data validation and reporting.
- Familiarity with **AMPscript** (nice‑to‑have).
- Demonstrated experience in **Agile and Waterfall** methodologies.
- Excellent problem‑solving, written and verbal **communication**, and **collaboration** skills.

---

## Preferred (Nice‑to‑Have) Skills
- Experience with **Cloud Testing** platforms (e.g., Sauce Labs, BrowserStack).
- Knowledge of **Continuous Delivery** concepts.
- Prior work with **Salesforce Marketing Cloud Journey Builder** advanced features.
- Exposure to **conflict resolution** and **team facilitation** techniques.

---

## Benefits & Compensation
- **Competitive salary range:** **$95,000 – $120,000 USD** per year (DOE).
- **W2 employment** with full benefits eligibility.
- **Medical, dental, and vision** insurance.
- **401(k) plan** with company match.
- **Paid time off** (PTO) and **holiday** schedule.
- **Professional development** stipend for certifications and training.
- Opportunity to work with cutting‑edge **marketing technology** and **cloud platforms**.

---

## About Logisoft Technologies
Logisoft Technologies Inc. is a premier **Technology, Consulting, Product Development, and Software Services** company founded in **2008**. Our headquarters are in **South Plainfield, NJ**, with additional offices in **Hyderabad, India**, and **Accra, Ghana**. We are a **Microsoft Certified Partner** and have earned the trust of leading IT market players over **17+ years**.

---

## How to Apply
Interested candidates should submit their **resume** and a brief **cover letter** highlighting relevant SFMC QA experience via the **Dice portal** or email **recruiter@logisoft.com** with the subject line **"SFMC QA Tester – Dallas"**. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis.

---

## Equal Employment Opportunity
Logisoft Technologies is committed to **Equal Employment Opportunity**. We do not discriminate on the basis of age, sex, sexual orientation, race, color, creed, national origin, ancestry, disability, marital status, or any other legally protected characteristic.

---

*This posting may have been generated with AI assistance and has been reviewed for accuracy.*
